snippet: Authorities investigating rape accusations against two high school football players in eastern Ohio have established a Web site that is intended to sort fact from fiction.
abstract: Authorities investigating rape accusations against two high school football players in Steubenville, Ohio, have established a Web site that they say is intended to sort fact from fiction.
lead_paragraph: Authorities investigating rape accusations against two high school football players in eastern Ohio have established a Web site that is intended to sort fact from fiction.

headline.seo: Web Site Focuses on Rape Case
headline.main: Web Site Focuses on Rape Case in Ohio
